# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_RUDDER_BROKEN

## Summary
Breaks off the rudder

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** dissapear

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets whether a rudder should be broken off or not
